GSP34ghers__u:827: <7.24/0> [[iti śrīgheraṇḍasaṃhitāyāṃ gheraṇḍacaṇḍasaṃvāde ghatasthayogasādhane yogasya saptasāre samādhiyogo nāma saptamopadeśaḥ
